property.name: name
property.value: Mashing Time

property.name: description
property.value: Learn how to brew cheap beer. We start off by making some Mash. You must have both: Brew Cooker and Brew Station. Required tools: Masher, Boiler, Carboy, and Bottle Capper.

property.name: offer
property.value: Learn how to brew cheap beer. We start off by making some Mash. You must have both: Brew Cooker and Brew Station. Required tools: Masher, Boiler, Carboy, and Bottle Capper.

property.name: name
property.value: All About Wort

property.name: description
property.value: After the Mash we need to boil up some Wort. You must have both: Brew Cooker and Brew Station. Required tools: Masher, Boiler, Carboy, and Bottle Capper.

property.name: offer
property.value: After the Mash we need to boil up some Wort. You must have both: Brew Cooker and Brew Station. Required tools: Masher, Boiler, Carboy, and Bottle Capper.

property.name: name
property.value: Primary Fermentation

property.name: description
property.value: Now we take our Wort and let it ferment into our Raw Beer. You must have both: Brew Cooker and Brew Station. Required tools: Masher, Boiler, Carboy, and Bottle Capper.

property.name: offer

property.value: Bottle Time

property.name: offer

property.value: Mysterious Mesquite

property.name: name
property.value: Farming Tools

property.name: group_name
property.value: Farming Crops

property.name: description
property.value: Learn how to plant crops and then receive Farm Life crop seeds. Farming requires a Hoe and farmable dirt. (Note: Must be in a forest biome). Once you recieve the Crop Seeds Crate, place it on the ground and destroy with an axe.
